title: Electric cars vs. flamingos
description:
The booming electric car industry in Chile has become a big nuisance for flamingos. Benji Jones explains.
Read Benji’s story: https://www.vox.com/22965660/electric-vehicles-lithium-ion-batteries-flamingos
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan and hosted by Rani Molla. The mix and music is by Jon Ehrens. Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
